name: ALLBLACK Phase 2 (NSAID) (NSAID)
description:
ALLBLACK Phase 2 is a visual novel adapted from light novel with the same title. This visual novel adapts the second volume (Chapter 7-12). It is recommended to read Phase 1 (covers Chapter 1-6) before reading this one.

DETAILS

  • Format : Kinetic Novel
  • Genre : Action, thriller, psychological, sci-fi
  • Length : 10k words/chapter
  • Language : English
  • Platform : PC (Windows, Mac, Linux) Android port soon

TEAM

  • Original story: fsc
  • VN Adaptation: MadScientist
  • Proofreader/Editor: Charlotte Benton, UltraShiko
  • Background cover: Satya Rizqi

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SUBMISSION TO NANORENO 2021

Half of Chapter 7 (around 5k words), will be updated later!
